    console.log("‚úÖ getTotalPosts:", total.toString())
    const total = await social.getTotalPosts()
console.log("üß™ Testing basic functions...")
const social = SocialFiCore.attach(socialAddress)
const SocialFiCore = await ethers.getContractFactory("SocialFiCore")
const socialAddress = "0x610F4E6D604bB6ab0AC8d1e7fa5445324e3E9af3"
console.log("Deploy TX:", social.deploymentTransaction().hash)
console.log("Address:", address)
console.log("üì§ Deploy TX:", tx.hash)
const tx = social.deploymentTransaction()
console.log("üìç Contract address:", address)
const address = await social.getAddress()
const social = await SocialFi.deploy("0xD59Da846F02A6C84D79C05F80CFB3B7ae2F21879", "0x9CD763b9a34c43123a70e69168C447C3dB1d51b7")
const SocialFi = await ethers.getContractFactory("SocialFiCore")

quit
que

que
